text: The Convention on Domestic Workers, formally the Convention concerning Decent Work for Domestic Workers is a convention setting labour standards for domestic workers. It is the 189th ILO convention and was adopted during the 100th session of the International Labour Organization, in 16 June 2011. It entered into force on 5 September 2013. ==References== Category:2011 Category:Domestic work Category:Treaties and Conventions
title: Convention on Domestic Workers
